Package com.dhemery.expressions.polling

Classes to poll conditions in PolledExpressions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PollTimer
    Manages time for a single poll.
    PollTimerPoller
    A poller that uses a PollTimer to pause between evaluations and to determine whether the schedule has expired.
    Sleeper
    Pauses execution for a specified duration.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClockPollTimer
    A poll timer that tells the time using a Clock and ticks by calling a Sleeper.
    DefaultPollingSchedule
    A singleton polling schedule with the default polling interval and duration.
    PollEvaluationResult<T>
    The result of a single evaluation during a poll.
    Within
    A polling schedule with a given duration and a default interval.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PollTimeoutException
    Indicates that a polling schedule expired before the polled condition was satisfied.

Package com.dhemery.expressions.polling Description

Classes to poll conditions in PolledExpressions.
